name: Flappy Beer
description:
A simple and endless tap game where you guide the flying beverage through obstacles trying to catch the floating hops along the way. 

Collect these hops to use them in the in game Hop Store to get new character skins! 

Tap the screen to start, and continue to tap to keep your player air bound. You will approach some pipes which you will need to navigate in between. The little green hops floating in the air are your friend, gather them up and collect as many as possible! If you crash into a pipe or hit the ground it's game over.
